title: Converting Linework to Intelligent Walls in AutoCAD Architecture
description:
This is a short introduction to creating architectural drawings using intelligent linework in the Architecture toolset.
To learn more, visit the Autodesk Knowledge Network article:
https://knowledge.autodesk.com/community/article/291271
 
When designing with the Architecture toolset, users can streamline their documentation process by converting static linework into intelligent linework and leveraging global style controls and the industry standard wall style library.
